title: Fix admin login password mismatch

requirements.text: Update the hardcoded admin credentials in `backend/main.mo` so that the `verifyAdminCredentials` function accepts exactly email `athiakash1977@gmail.com` and password `Akash@8667099605`. Ensure the stored password value and the comparison logic match this exact string with correct casing and special characters. The admin name should remain `Akash A`.

acceptanceCriteria: Calling `verifyAdminCredentials` with email `athiakash1977@gmail.com` and password `Akash@8667099605` returns a successful result (truthy/valid session token).
